SEARCH
Module LabAssignment
Package entity

Class ReportFilter

java.lang.Object
entity.ReportFilter
public class ReportFilter extends Object
A helper class used to filter internships specifically for report generation. This class allows Career Center Staff to define multiple criteria (e.g., date range, status, company) to select which internships should be included in a statistical report.

  • Constructor Details

    • ReportFilter

      public ReportFilter()
      Constructs a new ReportFilter. Initializes the filter with no active criteria (all fields null).

  • Method Details

    • applyFilter

      public boolean applyFilter(Internship internship)
      Checks if a specific internship matches the criteria defined in this filter. If no criteria are set (i.e., isValidFilter() is false), the internship matches by default.
      Parameters:
      internship - The internship to check.
      Returns:
      true if the internship matches all set criteria; false otherwise.

    • clearFilters

      public void clearFilters()
      Resets all filtering criteria to null. After calling this, applyFilter(Internship) will return true for any internship.

    • isValidFilter

      public boolean isValidFilter()
      Checks if any filtering criteria have been set.
      Returns:
      true if at least one filter field is not null; false if the filter is empty.

    • getStatus

      public InternshipStatus getStatus()
      Gets the status filter criterion.
      Returns:
      The status to filter by.

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(InternshipStatus status)
      Sets the status filter criterion.
      Parameters:
      status - The status to filter by.

    • getPreferredMajor

      public String getPreferredMajor()
      Gets the preferred major filter criterion.
      Returns:
      The major string.

    • setPreferredMajor

      public void setPreferredMajor(String preferredMajor)
      Sets the preferred major filter criterion.
      Parameters:
      preferredMajor - The major to filter by.

    • getLevel

      public InternshipLevel getLevel()
      Gets the internship level filter criterion.
      Returns:
      The level.

    • setLevel

      public void setLevel(InternshipLevel level)
      Sets the internship level filter criterion.
      Parameters:
      level - The level to filter by.

    • getCompanyName

      public String getCompanyName()
      Gets the company name filter criterion.
      Returns:
      The company name.

    • setCompanyName

      public void setCompanyName(String companyName)
      Sets the company name filter criterion.
      Parameters:
      companyName - The company name to filter by.

    • getStartDate

      public LocalDate getStartDate()
      Gets the start date for the filter range.
      Returns:
      The start date.

    • setStartDate

      public void setStartDate(LocalDate startDate)
      Sets the start date for the filter range. Internships opening before this date will be excluded.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start date.

    • getEndDate

      public LocalDate getEndDate()
      Gets the end date for the filter range.
      Returns:
      The end date.

    • setEndDate

      public void setEndDate(LocalDate endDate)
      Sets the end date for the filter range. Internships closing after this date will be excluded.
      Parameters:
      endDate - The end date.
